title: Station
description: Describes a location where charging stations are installed.  It records the street address, the operating organization, the site host contact, and characteristics of the site.  A station is a collection of charging ports at a given location.

station_id.description:
Unique identity specific to the physical location of the station (site) funded by the project.
(For NEVI/Part 680 programs, Station ID must be same as the permanent station identifier
provided to third parties pursuant to CFR 23 ยง 680.116(c)(1).

station_name.description: Descriptive name of charging site (e.g., Mercy Hospital)

station_city.description: City where charging station is located.

station_state.description: Valid state code of state where station or territory where the station is located.

station_zip.description: Valid ZIP code of where station is located.

station_lon.description:
Station center WSG84-encoded longitude in decimal degrees to at least 4 decimal places.
Valid longitudes are between -180 and 180

station_lat.description:
Station center WSG84 encoded latitude in decimal degrees to at least 4 decimal places.
Valid latitudes are between -90 and 90.

operator_name.description: Name of entity responsible for operation and maintenance of the funded charging station.

operator_address.description: Street address of entity responsible for operation and maintenance of the funded charging station.

operator_city.description: City of entity responsible for operation and maintenance of the funded charging station.

operator_state.description: Valid state code of entity responsible for operation and maintenance of the funded charging station.

operator_zip.description:
Valid ZIP Code of entity responsible for operation and maintenance
of the of the funded charging station.

site_host_type.description: Type of site host for the charging station. (e.g. public, workplace, MUD)

site_host_type_detail.description: Additional detail on site host land use. (e.g. hospital, hotel, parking garage, etc.)

host_first_name.description: Station host point of contact first name

host_last_name.description: Station host point of contact last name

host_email.description: Station host point of contact email address

der_power.description: Nameplate capacity of onsite energy generation in kW

der_energy.description:
Combined nameplate capacity of onsite energy generation and/or
maximum battery discharge capacity in kilowatts (kW).
